preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh 38.4 g of Erbium using an analytical balance. 
 2. Weigh 19.2 g of Germanium with the same balance. 
 3. Weigh 38.4 g of Selenium. 
 4. Combine the three elements in a clean, dry ceramic crucible. 
 5. Use a pestle and mortar to ensure a homogeneous mixture. Make sure to grind the materials until they are a fine powder.
